## About

Prof. Maria Grazia Spillantini is a distinguished molecular neurologist known for her groundbreaking work on tau proteins and neurodegenerative diseases. Her research has been instrumental in understanding the role of tau in various neurological disorders.

## Research Interests

- Tau protein pathology
- Microglia interactions
- Molecular mechanisms of neurodegeneration
- Therapeutic approaches for tauopathies
